hero_subtitle: Shekaru biyar cikin yakin, me ya yi saura a kasar?
intro_paragraph: An shafe shekara biyar ana yaki a Syria wanda ya yi sandiyar mutuwar mutane dubu 250.  miliyoyin mutane sun tsere daga kasar saboda yaki, saboda kusan mutane miliyan 18 su na cigaba da zama a kasar da yaki ya yiwa kaca kaca - ya rayuwa ta kasance musu?
section_1_paragraph: A birane da dama barazanar mutuwa da jikkata wasu abubuwa ne na rayuwa.  Kowa a Syria zai san mutanen da suka rasa rayukan su - sai dai ba za a taba iya sanin yawan mutanen da suka mutu ba.  Cibiyar take hakkin bayanai, wata kungiyar fafitika a kasar Syria ajiye bayanai a kan wadanda suka mutu da dalilan da ya haddasa mutuwarsu.  Ga sunanyen yara wadanda kungiyar ta tabbatar da mutuwarsu a lokacin yakin basasar.
ticker_para_part1: Zai iya daukar   domin ganin sunayen wadanda aka kashe
threestages_title: Matakai daban daban na yakin Syria
threestages_paragraph: Yawan fararen hula da aka kashe a duk wata
threestages_shootings_paragraph: Abinda ya fara a matsayin zanga zangar lumana a kan mulkin a Maris din shekarar 2011 ya zama zangazangar tashin hankali bayan jami'an tsaro sun yi amfani da karfin gaske kan fararen hula.
threestages_shootings_key: Mace mace da aka yi ta hanyar harbi
threestages_mortar_paragraph: Lokaci mafi muni a rikicin ya bayyana ne a shekarar 2012, a yayinda da kashe kashen su ka zama a kai kai kuma harin bindigar Igwa ya yi sanadiyar akasarin rayukan da aka rasa.
threestages_mortar_key: Mace mace da aka yi ta hanayr bindigar Igwa
threestages_airstrikes_paragraph: Da gwamanti ta lura bata samun nasara, sai dakarunta ta koma hare-hare  ta sama, kafin gamayyar kawancen da Amurka ke jagoranta a Satumbar shekarar 2014 da Rasha a satumbar shekarar 2015 ta fara hare-haren ta sama.
threestages_airstrikes_key: Rayukan da aka rasa a sanadiya hare-hare ta sama
threestages_all_key: Yawan mutanen da suka mutu (dukkan dalilai)
threestages_source: Hanyar da aka samu: Cibiyar take hakkin bayanai
section_2_title: Menene yawan mutanen da ke Syria har yanzu?
section_2_paragraph: Majalisar dinkin duniya ta yi kiyasin cewar har yanzu mutane miliyan 17.9 su na zaune a Syria - alkaluman sun ragu daga mutane miliyan 24.5 kafin a fara yakin.  Fiye da mutane miliyan 6 sun zama 'yan gudun hijira a cikin kasarsu bayan a matsa musu sun tsere daga gidajensu domin neman wani wurin da ya fi kwanciyar hanakali.  Amma ina su ke zama? Yawan mutane a larduna da dama sun ragu kuma akasarin wadanda su ka ragu sun tsere daga biranen domin neman muhalli a wajen gari.  Rayuwa na cigaba kamar dai kullun a sassa daban na babban birnin, Damasacus, amma a wasu wuraren miliyoyin mutane suna fafutikar yin rayuwa.  Majalisar dinkin duniya ta ce mutane miliyan 13.5 na bukatar agajin jin kai, da miliyoyin mutanen da ke wuraren da ke da wuyar shiga da yankunan da aka yiwa kawanya kamar Deir al-Zour.
city_3_name: Garuruwan da ke wajen birnin Damascus
population_source: Wurin da aka samo: Hukamar jin kai na majalisar dinkin duniya UNOCHA
section_3_title: Ya ya rayuwa ta ke ga wadanda su ke can har yanzu?
section_3_paragraph: Shekara biyar da aka shafe na yakin Syria din ya lalata komai na kasar banda tatalin arzikin ta, inda gaba daya kiyasin kudaden tatatlin arzikin kasar da cibiyar gudanar da bincike na Syria ta fitar  ta ka dala biliyan 225.  AA yayinda ake kiyasin cewa rashin aikin yi ya haura sama da kashi 50 cikin 100, ya yi sama daga kashi 14 cikin 100 a shekarar 2011, iyalai a Syria suna fafutika a kullun domin cimma burin rayuwa.  Kusan kashi 70 na mutane su na fama da matsanancin talauci da rashin iya samun abinci da ma wasu abubuwan na rayuwa wanda basu danganci abinci ba.  Fafutikar da su ke yi na tsananta saboda halin da harkar noman Syria ke ciki.  A baya yana daga cikin manyan bangaren tatalin arzikin kasar, rikicin Syria ya sa samar da abinci da fitar da shi ya lalace kuma larduna da dama suna fama da matsanancin karancin abinci.

legacy_ie_message: An tsara wannan shafin ne domin ya dace da masarrafar shafin intanet da aka sabunta, don haka ba zai yi aiki a Internet Explorer ba.
